column1: Little Goat Diner////We are from Napa
column3: vacationing in Chicago. Went to Little Goat two days in a row! Both times I had a cup of tomato/apple soup. I also had mac and cheese the first day and grilled cheese sandwich the next day.  My husband had a hamburger
column4: and on the second day buttermilk pancakes. Everything was great. Extensive
column5: but simple comfort food. Something for everyone
column6: and it is all delicious. Can't wait to visit again. We chose to sit outside in the shade. There was a wait both days for indoor seating.  Inside seemed crowded and noisy
